DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate lot-to-lot consistency , safety reactogenicity 3 dos GSK Biologicals ' 10-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine non-inferiority respect Prevenar .
DOC.brief_title: A Lot-to-lot Consistency ( 3 Lots GSK Biologicals ' 10-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine ) & Non-inferiority Study
DOC.detailed_description: Test group : 4 ( 400 subjects/group ) . 3 group receive 10-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine ( 3 different lot ) follow : - 10-valent vaccine ( lot 1 , 2 3 ) + DTPa combine vaccine ; Control group receive Prevenar + DTPa combine vaccine
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female , include , 6 12 week ( 4290 day ) age time first vaccination , free obvious health problem write informed consent obtain parent/guardian subject . Exclusion criterion : Use investigational nonregistered drug vaccine study vaccine within 30 day preceeding first dose study vaccine , plan use study period .
